sections.title: Introduction
sections.overview: Welcome to PiPilot - The revolutionary AI-powered development platform that transforms how you build modern web applications. PIXEL FORGE represents a new era in software development, combining conversational AI with advanced visual editing capabilities.
sections.content:
# Welcome to PiPilot

**PiPilot** is the revolutionary AI-powered development platform that transforms how you build modern web applications. At its core is PIXEL FORGE, a codename representing the fusion of cutting-edge AI technology with intuitive development workflows.

## What Makes PiPilot Unique?

PiPilot stands apart through its intelligent approach to development:

- **Conversational AI Development**: Transform natural language conversations into functional code
- **Multi-Framework Support**: Choose from Next.js, Vite+React, or Expo based on your project needs
- **Visual Editing Revolution**: Click-to-edit interface for real-time styling and component modifications
- **Seamless Integrations**: Connect with GitHub, Vercel, Netlify, Supabase, and Stripe
- **Enterprise-Grade Security**: Encrypted token storage and OAuth 2.0 compliance

## PIXEL FORGE Technology

PIXEL FORGE represents the underlying AI architecture that powers PiPilot's capabilities:

- **Advanced AI Models**: Integration with Mistral Pixtral and Codestral for optimal performance
- **Contextual Intelligence**: Deep understanding of development patterns and best practices
- **Real-Time Collaboration**: Live preview and collaborative editing features
- **Scalable Architecture**: Built for both individual developers and enterprise teams

## Getting Started

Begin your PiPilot journey by exploring the key sections of this documentation:

- **PiPilot Features**: Discover the conversational AI and visual editing capabilities
- **Supported Frameworks**: Learn about Next.js, Vite+React, and Expo integration
- **Core PiPilot Capabilities**: Explore file operations and development tools
- **SWE Agent Capabilities**: Understand the elite repository management features
- **Integration System**: Connect with your favorite development tools and services

> **Ready to start building?** Head to the workspace and begin your first conversation with PiPilot's AI assistant.

sections.title: PiPilot Features
sections.overview: Explore PiPilot's comprehensive AI-driven development capabilities including conversational coding, voice integration, visual editing, and intelligent project creation tools.
sections.content:
# PiPilot Features

PiPilot offers a revolutionary development experience powered by advanced AI technologies and intuitive user interfaces.

## ü§ñ Conversational AI Engine

### Multi-Model Integration
- **Mistral Pixtral**: Advanced vision and language processing
- **Codestral**: Specialized code generation and analysis
- **Contextual Conversations**: Maintains project history and understanding
- **Natural Language Processing**: Transforms conversations into functional applications

### Voice Integration
- **Speech-to-Text**: Real-time voice command processing
- **Audio Recording**: Noise-filtered voice input with professional quality
- **Voice Commands**: Execute development operations through speech
- **Multilingual Support**: Multiple language voice interactions

## üé® Visual Development Revolution

### Click-to-Edit Interface
- **Live Element Selection**: Click any element in the preview to edit
- **Real-Time Styling**: Instant property modifications with visual feedback
- **Component Manipulation**: Direct editing of React components and props
- **Theme Switching**: One-click theme application with CSS variable support

### Advanced Typography
- **100+ Google Fonts**: Extensive font library with live preview
- **Dynamic Font Loading**: Optimized loading and caching
- **Typography Scaling**: Consistent text sizing across devices
- **Accessibility Compliance**: WCAG-compliant font choices

## üöÄ Intelligent Project Creation

### AI-Powered Naming
- **Smart Project Names**: Generate memorable, professional project names
- **Brand Psychology**: Apply modern naming conventions and patterns
- **Domain Availability**: Check name availability across platforms
- **SEO Optimization**: Search-friendly naming suggestions

### Description Synthesis
- **Automated Descriptions**: Create comprehensive project descriptions
- **Feature Extraction**: Identify and highlight key project features
- **Audience Targeting**: Tailor descriptions for specific user groups
- **Marketing Copy**: Generate compelling project summaries

## üìé Advanced Input Capabilities

### URL Attachment System
- **Content Analysis**: Extract and process external web content
- **Reference Management**: Organize external resources and links
- **API Integration**: Direct connection to external services
- **Content Import**: Seamless import of external data and assets

### GitHub/GitLab Integration
- **Repository Cloning**: Direct import of existing projects
- **Code Analysis**: Intelligent code review and suggestions
- **Issue Tracking**: Connect with project management tools
- **Collaboration Features**: Team-based development workflows

## üß† AI Enhancement Features

### Prompt Enhancement
- **Intelligent Refinement**: Transform basic requests into detailed prompts
- **Context Addition**: Include framework-specific and technical details
- **Best Practices Integration**: Add industry standards and patterns
- **Creativity Balancing**: Maintain creativity while ensuring technical feasibility

### Suggestion System
- **Component Suggestions**: Recommend appropriate UI components for use cases
- **Code Pattern Recognition**: Suggest optimal implementation patterns
- **Optimization Recommendations**: Identify performance and accessibility improvements
- **Integration Proposals**: Suggest third-party service integrations

## ‚ö° Real-Time Development Experience

### Live Preview System
- **Instant Feedback**: See changes immediately in the browser
- **Responsive Testing**: Built-in device size and orientation testing
- **Performance Monitoring**: Live performance metrics and optimization indicators
- **Error Visualization**: Clear error indicators with actionable suggestions

### Collaborative Features
- **Real-Time Editing**: Multiple users can edit the same project simultaneously
- **Change Synchronization**: Automatic synchronization of changes across all users
- **Comment System**: Inline comments and feedback on specific elements
- **Sharing Options**: Share projects with team members and stakeholders

## üîß Framework Intelligence

### Next.js Optimization
- **App Router Support**: Full support for Next.js 13+ App Router
- **Server Components**: Zero-bundle-size components with direct database access
- **API Route Generation**: Automated CRUD API endpoint creation
- **Performance Optimization**: Built-in performance best practices

### Vite+React Features
- **Lightning-Fast Builds**: Optimized Vite configuration
- **Client-Side Routing**: Intelligent routing suggestions
- **Component Libraries**: Integration with popular React libraries
- **Build Optimization**: Tree-shaking and code splitting

### Expo Capabilities
- **Native Features**: Access to device hardware and sensors
- **Cross-Platform**: iOS, Android, and Web deployment
- **Offline Support**: Built-in offline functionality
- **App Store Integration**: Automated app store deployment

## üè¢ Enterprise Features

### Security Integration
- **Encrypted Communications**: End-to-end encryption for all data
- **Authentication Systems**: Multiple authentication providers
- **Permission Management**: Granular access control
- **Audit Logging**: Comprehensive activity tracking

### Scalability Features
- **Auto-Scaling**: Automatic resource allocation based on usage
- **Load Balancing**: Intelligent traffic distribution across services
- **Caching Strategies**: Multi-layer caching for improved performance
- **Database Optimization**: Automatic query optimization and indexing

## üìä Analytics & Insights

### Usage Analytics
- **Development Metrics**: Track coding patterns and productivity
- **Performance Monitoring**: Application speed and reliability metrics
- **User Behavior**: Understand how users interact with applications
- **Conversion Tracking**: Monitor goal completion and user journeys

### AI Insights
- **Code Quality Analysis**: Automated code review and suggestions
- **Best Practice Recommendations**: Industry standard compliance
- **Performance Optimization**: Identify and resolve performance bottlenecks
- **Security Assessment**: Automated security vulnerability detection

## üîå Plugin Architecture

### Extensibility
- **Custom Plugins**: Develop and integrate custom functionality
- **API Access**: Full access to PiPilot's underlying APIs
- **Event System**: Hook into development lifecycle events
- **Community Plugins**: Access to community-developed extensions

### Integration APIs
- **REST API**: Comprehensive REST API for external integrations
- **Webhook Support**: Real-time event notifications
- **SDK Availability**: Software development kits for multiple languages
- **Documentation**: Complete API documentation and examples

sections.title: Supported Frameworks
sections.overview: PiPilot supports three main frameworks - Next.js for full-stack apps, Vite+React for client-side applications, and Expo for cross-platform mobile development.
sections.content:
# Supported Frameworks

PiPilot provides comprehensive support for three modern web and mobile development frameworks, each optimized for different use cases and deployment scenarios.

## ‚öõÔ∏è Next.js - Full-Stack Web Applications

### Perfect For:
- **E-commerce Platforms**: Dynamic product catalogs, shopping carts, payment integration
- **Content Management Systems**: Blogs, documentation sites, marketing websites
- **SaaS Applications**: User dashboards, admin panels, subscription services
- **API-First Development**: Backend services with frontend interfaces

### Key Capabilities:
- **App Router**: Full support for Next.js 13+ App Router with nested layouts and loading states
- **Server-Side Rendering (SSR)**: Dynamic content rendering on the server for optimal SEO
- **Static Site Generation (SSG)**: Pre-built pages for maximum performance
- **API Routes**: Built-in backend API endpoints with automatic routing
- **Middleware Support**: Request preprocessing and authentication
- **Image Optimization**: Automatic image optimization and WebP conversion

### Deployment Options:
- **Vercel**: Native deployment with edge functions and global CDN
- **Netlify**: Static hosting with form handling and serverless functions
- **Self-Hosted**: Docker containers and traditional server deployment

## ‚ö° Vite + React - Client-Side Applications

### Perfect For:
- **Interactive Tools**: Code editors, design tools, productivity apps
- **Single Page Applications (SPAs)**: Dashboards, data visualization, social platforms
- **Progressive Web Apps (PWAs)**: Offline-capable web applications
- **Component Libraries**: Reusable UI components and design systems

### Key Capabilities:
- **Lightning-Fast Development**: Sub-second hot module replacement (HMR)
- **Modern ES Modules**: Native JavaScript module system for better tree-shaking
- **Tree Shaking**: Automatic dead code elimination for smaller bundles
- **CSS Modules**: Scoped styling with automatic class name generation
- **Plugin Ecosystem**: Extensive plugin system for enhanced functionality
- **TypeScript Support**: First-class TypeScript integration

### Deployment Options:
- **Netlify**: Optimized for SPAs with form handling and functions
- **Vercel**: Serverless deployment with edge computing
- **AWS S3 + CloudFront**: Cost-effective static hosting
- **GitHub Pages**: Free hosting for open source projects

## üì± Expo - Cross-Platform Mobile Applications

### Perfect For:
- **Consumer Applications**: Social apps, productivity tools, utilities
- **Location-Based Services**: Maps, delivery apps, local discovery
- **Media Applications**: Camera apps, social media, content creation
- **IoT Integration**: Hardware-connected mobile applications

### Key Capabilities:
- **Universal Platform**: Single codebase for iOS, Android, and Web
- **Native Device Access**: Camera, GPS, accelerometer, biometric authentication
- **Native Performance**: Compiled native code with React Native bridge
- **Offline-First**: Local storage and synchronization capabilities
- **Push Notifications**: Real-time notifications with custom sounds

### Deployment Options:
- **App Stores**: iOS App Store and Google Play Store
- **Expo Application Services (EAS)**: Managed build and submission
- **Web Deployment**: PWA support for web browsers
- **Enterprise Distribution**: Internal app distribution

## üìä Framework Comparison

| Feature | Next.js | Vite + React | Expo |
|---------|---------|--------------|------|
| **Rendering** | SSR/SSG/CSR | CSR/SPA | Native Mobile/Web |
| **Backend** | Built-in | External APIs | Device APIs |
| **Deployment** | Server/Static | Static/CDN | App Stores/Web |
| **Performance** | Excellent | Excellent | Good |
| **SEO** | Excellent | Poor | Limited |
| **Offline** | Limited | PWA | Native |
| **Learning Curve** | Medium | Easy | Medium |

## üõ†Ô∏è Unified Development Experience

### Shared Technologies:
- **React**: Component-based architecture across all frameworks
- **TypeScript**: Type-safe development with intelligent code completion
- **Tailwind CSS**: Utility-first styling with consistent design system
- **PiPilot AI**: Intelligent code generation and suggestions for all frameworks

### Framework-Specific Intelligence:
- **Context-Aware Suggestions**: Framework-appropriate code generation
- **Best Practice Integration**: Framework-specific patterns and conventions
- **Optimization Recommendations**: Performance and architecture guidance
- **Migration Assistance**: Help transitioning between frameworks

## üöÄ Getting Started with Frameworks

### Choosing Your Framework:

**Choose Next.js if you need:**
- SEO-critical applications
- Server-side rendering
- Built-in API capabilities
- E-commerce or content-heavy sites

**Choose Vite + React if you need:**
- Maximum development speed
- Client-side applications
- Interactive tools and dashboards
- Cost-effective static hosting

**Choose Expo if you need:**
- Native mobile functionality
- Device hardware access
- Offline-capable applications

### Framework Migration:

PiPilot supports seamless migration between frameworks:
- **Code Analysis**: Automatic detection of migration complexity
- **Refactoring Suggestions**: Framework-specific code transformations
- **Compatibility Checks**: Ensure feature parity during migration
- **Testing Integration**: Automated testing for migrated applications

## üìö Learning Resources

### Next.js Resources:
- [Next.js Documentation](https://nextjs.org/docs)
- [PiPilot Next.js Guide](https://pipilot.dev/docs/nextjs)
- [Vercel Deployment Guide](https://vercel.com/docs)

### Vite + React Resources:
- [Vite Documentation](https://vitejs.dev/guide/)
- [React Documentation](https://react.dev/learn)
- [PiPilot Vite Guide](https://pipilot.dev/docs/vite)

### Expo Resources:
- [Expo Documentation](https://docs.expo.dev/)
- [React Native Guide](https://reactnative.dev/docs/getting-started)
- [PiPilot Expo Guide](https://pipilot.dev/docs/expo)

sections.title: Core PiPilot Capabilities
sections.overview: Discover PiPilot's advanced file operations, AI-driven development tools, and powerful project management features.
sections.content:
# Core PiPilot Capabilities

PiPilot provides a comprehensive suite of development tools powered by advanced AI and seamless integration with modern development workflows.

## üîß Advanced File Operations

PiPilot offers extensive file system operations that provide direct access to project files through specialized JSON tool commands.

### Available Operations:

- **`write_file`**: Create new files or completely replace existing file content with new content
- **`read_file`**: Read file contents with mandatory line-range parameters for files over 150 lines to prevent system overload
- **`delete_file`**: Remove individual files from the project with proper cleanup
- **`delete_folder`**: Remove entire directories and all their contents recursively
- **`edit_file`**: Precise file editing using Git diff-style search/replace blocks with regex support
- **`client_replace_string_in_file`**: Advanced string replacement with regex patterns, case-insensitive matching, and bulk operations
- **`remove_package`**: Uninstall npm packages from package.json with dependency cleanup

### File Operation Features:
- **Live Preview**: Updates the application view in real-time as changes are made
- **Safe Operations**: Built-in confirmation mechanisms for destructive operations
- **Version Control**: Automatic Git integration for all file changes
- **Error Handling**: Comprehensive error reporting and recovery mechanisms

## ü§ñ AI-Powered Development

### Intelligent Code Generation:
- **Conversational Coding**: Transform natural language into functional code
- **Context Awareness**: Understand project structure and existing code patterns
- **Framework Intelligence**: Generate framework-appropriate code and configurations
- **Best Practice Integration**: Include industry standards and security practices

### Smart Project Analysis:
- **Code Review**: Automated code quality assessment and improvement suggestions
- **Dependency Management**: Intelligent package recommendations and version management
- **Performance Optimization**: Identify and resolve performance bottlenecks
- **Security Scanning**: Automated vulnerability detection and remediation

## üèóÔ∏è Project Management Tools

### Template System:
- **Pre-Built Templates**: Professional templates for common application types
- **Custom Templates**: Create and save reusable project templates
- **Template Categories**: Organized by industry, framework, and use case
- **Live Customization**: Modify templates during project creation

### Project Intelligence:
- **Architecture Suggestions**: Recommend optimal project structures
- **Technology Stack**: Suggest appropriate technologies based on requirements
- **Scalability Planning**: Design considerations for future growth
- **Deployment Strategy**: Recommend hosting and deployment solutions

## üîç Advanced Search & Analysis

### Code Search Capabilities:
- **Semantic Search**: Understand code meaning beyond literal text matching
- **Cross-Reference Tracking**: Find all usages of functions, variables, and components
- **Pattern Recognition**: Identify code patterns and anti-patterns
- **Dependency Analysis**: Map relationships between code components

### Multi-Strategy Search:
- **Literal Text Search**: Exact string matching across the codebase
- **Regex Patterns**: Advanced pattern matching for complex searches
- **Intelligent Code Detection**: Context-aware code pattern recognition
- **Session-Based Analysis**: Fast, comprehensive analysis with cached results

## ‚úÖ Quality Assurance

### Build Process Monitoring:
- **Automated Testing**: Integration with Jest, Cypress, and other testing frameworks
- **Build Error Detection**: Real-time error identification and suggestions
- **Performance Testing**: Automated performance benchmarking
- **Code Coverage**: Track test coverage and identify gaps

### Error Prevention:
- **Type Checking**: TypeScript integration with intelligent error suggestions
- **Linting Integration**: ESLint and Prettier with automatic fixes
- **Security Scanning**: Automated security vulnerability detection
- **Accessibility Auditing**: WCAG compliance checking and recommendations

## üåê Web Integration

### External API Management:
- **API Integration**: Connect with third-party services and APIs
- **Authentication Handling**: Manage API keys and OAuth flows
- **Rate Limiting**: Intelligent rate limit management and retry logic
- **Error Handling**: Comprehensive API error handling and recovery

### Content Import:
- **URL Processing**: Import content from external URLs
- **File Upload**: Handle file uploads with validation and processing
- **Data Transformation**: Convert external data formats to project-compatible formats
- **Asset Management**: Organize and optimize imported assets

## ‚ö° Performance Optimization

### Build Optimization:
- **Code Splitting**: Automatic code splitting for faster loading
- **Asset Optimization**: Image compression, font subsetting, and CDN integration
- **Bundle Analysis**: Detailed bundle size analysis and optimization recommendations
- **Caching Strategies**: Implement effective caching for static and dynamic content

### Runtime Optimization:
- **Lazy Loading**: Automatic implementation of lazy loading for components and routes
- **Memory Management**: Optimize memory usage and prevent memory leaks
- **Rendering Optimization**: Virtual scrolling, memoization, and efficient re-rendering
- **Network Optimization**: Reduce network requests and optimize data fetching

## üîê Security & Compliance

### Code Security:
- **Vulnerability Scanning**: Automated detection of security vulnerabilities
- **Dependency Auditing**: Monitor third-party package security
- **Code Review**: AI-powered security-focused code review
- **Encryption**: Secure handling of sensitive data and credentials

### Access Control:
- **Authentication Integration**: Support for multiple authentication providers
- **Authorization**: Granular permission management and access control
- **Audit Logging**: Complete audit logging for compliance and security
- **Compliance**: Support for GDPR, HIPAA, and other regulatory requirements

## üìà Analytics & Monitoring

### Development Analytics:
- **Productivity Tracking**: Monitor coding patterns and development velocity
- **Code Quality Metrics**: Track code complexity, maintainability, and technical debt
- **Collaboration Insights**: Understand team dynamics and contribution patterns
- **Progress Tracking**: Monitor project milestones and delivery timelines

### Application Monitoring:
- **Performance Metrics**: Real-time application performance monitoring
- **Error Tracking**: Automated error detection and alerting
- **User Analytics**: Track user behavior and application usage patterns
- **Conversion Tracking**: Monitor goal completion and user journeys

## üîÑ Workflow Automation

### Development Workflows:
- **CI/CD Integration**: Automated testing and deployment pipelines
- **Code Formatting**: Automatic code formatting and style enforcement
- **Documentation Generation**: Automated API documentation and code comments
- **Release Management**: Automated versioning and release processes

### Task Management:
- **Todo Tracking**: Create and manage development tasks
- **Progress Monitoring**: Track task completion and project progress
- **Time Tracking**: Monitor development time and productivity
- **Collaboration**: Team task assignment and progress sharing

sections.title: SWE Agent Capabilities
sections.overview: Explore the SWE Agent's elite software engineering capabilities including direct GitHub repository operations, advanced code analysis, and comprehensive version control management.
sections.content:
# SWE Agent Capabilities

The SWE Agent represents PiPilot's elite software engineering assistant, providing direct access to GitHub repository operations through advanced API integration and intelligent automation.

## üéØ Mission & Architecture

### PIXEL FORGE Technology:
- **Codename**: PIXEL FORGE - The core AI architecture powering repository operations
- **Direct API Access**: Unrestricted GitHub API integration for comprehensive repository control
- **Real-Time Operations**: Instant execution of repository commands and file manipulations
- **Enterprise Security**: Bank-level encryption and permission management

### Core Philosophy:
- **Repository-Centric**: All operations revolve around GitHub repository management
- **Developer-First**: Designed by developers for developers
- **Automation-Powered**: Intelligent automation of complex development workflows
- **Quality-Assured**: Built-in quality checks and validation mechanisms

## üîß Advanced File Operations

### Precision Editing Tools:
- **`github_stage_change`**: Stage file changes in memory for atomic commits
- **`github_commit_changes`**: Execute Git tree operations (Blobs ‚Üí Tree ‚Üí Commit ‚Üí Ref)
- **`github_write_file`**: Create or completely replace repository files
- **`github_read_file`**: Read files with advanced line-range and formatting options
- **`github_delete_file`**: Remove files with proper Git history preservation
- **`github_edit_file`**: Git diff-style search/replace with regex support

### Intelligent File Management:
- **Search & Replace**: Advanced string replacement with regex patterns
- **Bulk Operations**: Handle multiple files simultaneously
- **Version Control**: Automatic Git integration for all file operations
- **Conflict Resolution**: Intelligent merge conflict detection and resolution

## üìä Code Analysis Engine

### Semantic Search Technology:
- **`github_semantic_search`**: Advanced semantic code search with cross-reference tracking
- **`github_grep_search`**: Elite multi-strategy search engine with session storage
- **Natural Language Queries**: Search code using plain English descriptions
- **Pattern Recognition**: Identify code structures and relationships

### Analysis Features:
- **Cross-Reference Tracking**: Find all usages of functions and variables
- **Code Pattern Detection**: Recognize design patterns and anti-patterns
- **Dependency Mapping**: Visualize code relationships and import structures
- **Session Storage**: Fast, comprehensive analysis with cached results

## üèóÔ∏è Version Control Mastery

### Git Operations:
- **`github_create_branch`**: Create feature branches for organized development
- **`github_get_commits`**: View detailed commit history with file changes
- **`github_get_commit`**: Analyze specific commits with full diffs and metadata
- **`github_revert_to_commit`**: Force reset to specific commits (destructive operation)
- **`github_create_pull_request`**: Generate PRs with proper descriptions

### Branch Management:
- **Branch Protection**: Respect repository branch protection rules
- **Merge Strategies**: Intelligent merge conflict resolution
- **Pull Request Creation**: Automated PR creation with proper descriptions

## üîÑ Workflow Automation

### GitHub Actions Integration:
- **`github_list_workflows`**: View all repository workflows
- **`github_trigger_workflow`**: Manually trigger workflow runs with parameters
- **`github_list_workflow_runs`**: Monitor workflow execution with status filtering
- **`github_get_workflow_run`**: Access detailed run information and timing
- **`github_get_workflow_run_logs`**: Download complete workflow execution logs
- **`github_cancel_workflow_run`**: Stop in-progress workflow executions
- **`github_rerun_workflow`**: Re-execute failed or previous workflow runs

### CI/CD Automation:
- **Deployment Monitoring**: Real-time deployment status and logs
- **Build Verification**: Automated build validation and testing
- **Environment Management**: Multi-environment deployment handling

## üåê Web Research Integration

### External Knowledge Access:
- **`web_search`**: Search current web information with structured results
- **`web_extract`**: Extract content from specific web pages and documentation
- **Current Information**: Access up-to-date programming frameworks and APIs
- **Documentation Analysis**: Research solutions to technical problems

### Research Capabilities:
- **API Documentation**: Access current API specifications and examples
- **Framework Updates**: Stay current with framework releases and changes
- **Troubleshooting**: Research solutions to technical problems

## ‚úÖ Development Quality Assurance

### Build Process Integration:
- **`check_dev_errors`**: Run build processes for JavaScript/TypeScript projects
- **`python_syntax_check`**: Syntax validation for Python projects
- **Error Detection**: Monitor console logs for compilation and runtime errors
- **Success/Failure Reporting**: Clear status reporting for all checks

## üìã Task Management System

### Todo Management:
- **`github_create_todo`**: Create structured task items with unique IDs
- **`github_update_todo`**: Modify task status, titles, and descriptions
- **`github_delete_todo`**: Remove completed or obsolete tasks

### Task Features:
- **Unique ID System**: Consistent task identification across sessions
- **Status Tracking**: Pending, completed, and in-progress states
- **Progress Monitoring**: Detailed task descriptions and requirements

## üöÄ Repository Operations

### Repository Management:
- **`github_list_repos`**: Browse accessible repositories with filtering
- **`github_get_repo_info`**: Access detailed repository metadata
- **`github_create_repo`**: Create new GitHub repositories programmatically

### Advanced Features:
- **Multi-Repository Support**: Work across multiple repositories seamlessly
- **Organization Management**: Handle GitHub organizations and teams

## üè∑Ô∏è Release & Tagging

### Tag Management:
- **`github_create_tag`**: Create annotated or lightweight tags
- **`github_list_tags`**: Browse repository tags and releases
- **`github_delete_tag`**: Remove tags when necessary

### Release Automation:
- **Release Notes**: Generate comprehensive release documentation
- **Changelog Creation**: Automated changelog generation from commits

## üìä Status Monitoring

### Commit Status Integration:
- **`github_get_commit_statuses`**: Monitor CI/CD and deployment statuses
- **Status Checks**: View required status checks and their results

### Health Monitoring:
- **Repository Health**: Monitor repository metrics and statistics
- **Collaboration Metrics**: Track team activity and contribution patterns

## üõ°Ô∏è Safety Protocols

### Operational Safety:
- **Destructive Operation Warnings**: Clear warnings for dangerous operations
- **Confirmation Mechanisms**: Required confirmation for critical actions
- **Audit Logging**: Comprehensive logging of all operations

### Security Measures:
- **Permission Validation**: Verify user permissions before operations
- **Rate Limiting**: Respect GitHub API rate limits and quotas

## ‚ö° Performance Optimization

### Operation Efficiency:
- **Batch Operations**: Combine multiple operations for efficiency
- **Caching Strategies**: Intelligent caching of frequently accessed data
- **Parallel Processing**: Execute independent operations concurrently

### API Optimization:
- **Request Batching**: Combine multiple API calls into single requests
- **Conditional Requests**: Use ETags and conditional headers
- **Pagination Handling**: Efficient handling of large result sets

## üîó Ecosystem Integration

### Development Tools:
- **IDE Integration**: Connect with popular code editors and IDEs
- **CLI Tools**: Command-line interface for automation and scripting
- **Package Managers**: Integration with npm, yarn, and other package managers

### Platform Support:
- **GitHub Enterprise**: Support for GitHub Enterprise Server
- **GitLab Integration**: Cross-platform Git repository management

## üìö Documentation & Learning

### Built-in Documentation:
- **Interactive Help**: Context-sensitive help and documentation
- **API Reference**: Comprehensive API documentation
- **Tutorial System**: Step-by-step guides for common operations

### Learning Features:
- **Progressive Disclosure**: Show advanced features as needed
- **Guided Workflows**: Step-by-step guidance for complex operations

## üéØ Advanced Use Cases

### Enterprise Development:
- **Large-Scale Projects**: Handle projects with thousands of files
- **Team Collaboration**: Advanced collaboration features for large teams
- **Compliance Management**: Meet enterprise security and compliance requirements

### Open Source Development:
- **Community Management**: Tools for managing open source communities
- **Contribution Workflows**: Streamlined contribution and review processes
- **Release Automation**: Automated release processes for open source projects

sections.title: Integration System
sections.overview: PiPilot integrates with essential development tools including GitHub, Vercel, Netlify, Supabase, Stripe, marketplace, and real-time messaging for comprehensive development workflows.
sections.content:
# Integration System

PiPilot seamlessly connects with industry-leading development tools and services, providing a unified development experience across your entire technology stack.

## üêô GitHub Integration

### Version Control & Repository Management:
- **Repository Access**: Direct connection to GitHub repositories for seamless development
- **Push Deployments**: Automated deployment triggers from GitHub pushes
- **Webhook Integration**: Real-time notifications for repository events
- **Branch Management**: Create, merge, and manage branches directly from PiPilot

### Advanced Features:
- **Repository Cloning**: Import existing GitHub projects into PiPilot
- **Collaborative Development**: Team-based development with GitHub's collaboration tools
- **Issue Tracking**: Connect GitHub issues with PiPilot projects
- **Pull Request Management**: Create and manage PRs from within PiPilot

## ‚ñ≤ Vercel Deployments

### Serverless Deployment Platform:
- **One-Click Deployments**: Deploy applications directly to Vercel with automatic builds
- **Custom Domains**: Configure and manage custom domain settings
- **Environment Variables**: Secure environment variable management
- **Build Logs**: Real-time access to deployment logs and status

### Performance Features:
- **Global CDN**: Automatic content delivery network for optimal performance
- **Edge Functions**: Serverless functions at the edge for reduced latency
- **Automatic Scaling**: Scale applications automatically based on traffic
- **Analytics Integration**: Built-in performance and usage analytics

## üåê Netlify Hosting

### Static Site & Serverless Hosting:
- **Static Site Hosting**: Optimized hosting for static sites and SPAs
- **Form Submissions**: Built-in form handling and spam protection
- **Serverless Functions**: Deploy serverless functions alongside static content
- **Build Hooks**: Trigger builds automatically from various sources

### Developer Experience:
- **Continuous Deployment**: Automatic deployments from Git repository
- **Preview Deployments**: Generate preview URLs for every pull request
- **Split Testing**: A/B testing and feature flag management
- **Asset Optimization**: Automatic image optimization and asset compression

## üóÑÔ∏è Supabase Database

### Open Source Firebase Alternative:
- **Real-Time Database**: PostgreSQL with real-time capabilities
- **Authentication**: Built-in user authentication and authorization
- **Storage**: File storage with automatic optimization and CDN
- **Edge Functions**: Serverless functions for backend logic

### Database Features:
- **SQL Editor**: Direct SQL query execution and database management
- **Row Level Security**: Fine-grained access control for data
- **Real-Time Subscriptions**: Live data synchronization across clients
- **API Generation**: Automatic REST and GraphQL API generation

## üí≥ Stripe Payments

### Payment Processing & Subscriptions:
- **Payment Intents**: Secure payment processing with PCI compliance
- **Subscriptions**: Recurring billing and subscription management
- **Webhooks**: Real-time notifications for payment events
- **Refunds**: Automated refund processing and management

### Business Features:
- **Multi-Currency Support**: Process payments in multiple currencies
- **Tax Calculation**: Automated tax compliance and calculation
- **Fraud Detection**: Advanced fraud prevention and detection
- **Reporting**: Comprehensive financial reporting and analytics

## üõí Marketplace Platform

### Template Marketplace:
- **Template Sales**: Monetize custom templates and components
- **Revenue Sharing**: Automated revenue distribution to creators
- **Template Licensing**: Flexible licensing options for different use cases
- **Creator Dashboard**: Track sales, earnings, and performance metrics

### Admin Management:
- **Payout Processing**: Admin-controlled payout approval and processing
- **Creator Verification**: Validate creator identities and content quality
- **Dispute Resolution**: Handle payment disputes and chargebacks
- **Analytics Dashboard**: Comprehensive marketplace analytics and insights

## üí¨ Real-Time Messaging

### Pusher Integration:
- **Live Chat**: Real-time messaging for collaborative development
- **Event Broadcasting**: Live updates for project changes and notifications
- **Presence Channels**: Track online users and collaborative sessions
- **Message History**: Persistent message storage and retrieval

### Developer Features:
- **WebSocket Connections**: Low-latency real-time communication
- **Channel Management**: Private and public messaging channels
- **Message Encryption**: End-to-end encryption for sensitive communications
- **Scalability**: Handle thousands of concurrent connections

## üîê Secure Token Storage

### Enterprise-Grade Security:
- **Encrypted Storage**: All API tokens and credentials are encrypted at rest
- **OAuth 2.0 Compliance**: Secure authentication flows following industry standards
- **Token Rotation**: Automatic token refresh and rotation
- **Access Control**: Granular permissions for token usage

### Security Features:
- **Client-Side Protection**: Credentials never exposed to client-side code
- **Audit Logging**: Comprehensive logging of all token access and usage
- **Revocation**: Immediate token revocation capabilities
- **Compliance**: Meets enterprise security and compliance requirements

## üîÑ Integration Workflow

### Connection Process:
- **Account Linking**: Connect services through OAuth or API token authentication
- **Project Configuration**: Configure repository and service connections per project
- **Environment Setup**: Set up different environments (development, staging, production)
- **Testing Integration**: Validate all integrations before deployment

### Management Features:
- **Dashboard Overview**: Unified view of all connected services and their status
- **Health Monitoring**: Real-time monitoring of integration health and performance
- **Error Handling**: Intelligent error detection and automatic retry mechanisms
- **Update Management**: Handle API changes and service updates automatically

## üèóÔ∏è Architecture Patterns

### Full-Stack Development:
- **Database + Backend**: Supabase for data and serverless functions
- **Frontend Framework**: React/Next.js with optimized deployment
- **Hosting**: Vercel or Netlify for global content delivery
- **Payments**: Stripe for monetization and subscription management

### E-commerce Stack:
- **Product Catalog**: Next.js with ISR for dynamic product pages
- **Database**: Supabase for inventory and order management
- **Payments**: Stripe for secure payment processing
- **Hosting**: Vercel for serverless e-commerce functionality

### SaaS Platform:
- **User Management**: Supabase Auth for user registration and profiles
- **Billing**: Stripe for subscription and usage-based billing
- **Application**: Next.js for the main application with API routes
- **Hosting**: Vercel for scalable serverless deployment

## ‚ö° Performance Optimization

### Integration Efficiency:
- **Request Batching**: Combine multiple API calls for reduced latency
- **Caching Strategies**: Intelligent caching of frequently accessed data
- **CDN Integration**: Global content delivery for static assets
- **Lazy Loading**: On-demand loading of integration components

### Monitoring & Analytics:
- **Performance Metrics**: Track integration response times and success rates
- **Error Tracking**:  Comprehensive error logging and alerting
- **Usage Analytics**: Monitor integration usage patterns and costs
- **Health Checks**: Automated health monitoring for all connected services

## üõ°Ô∏è Security & Compliance

### Data Protection:
- **Encryption**: End-to-end encryption for all data and communications
- **Access Control**: Role-based access control for integration management
- **Audit Trails**: Complete audit logging for compliance and security
- **GDPR Compliance**: Data protection and privacy regulation compliance

### Enterprise Features:
- **SSO Integration**: Single sign-on support for enterprise accounts
- **Multi-Tenant Architecture**: Secure isolation between different organizations
- **Compliance Reporting**: Automated compliance reporting and certification
- **Security Scanning**: Regular security audits and vulnerability assessment

## üìä Analytics & Insights

### Integration Analytics:
- **Usage Tracking**: Monitor which integrations are most frequently used
- **Performance Insights**: Track response times and success rates
- **Cost Analysis**: Monitor and optimize integration costs
- **Error Patterns**: Identify common integration issues and solutions

### Business Intelligence:
- **Conversion Tracking**: Monitor how integrations affect user conversion
- **Feature Adoption**: Track adoption rates of different integration features
- **ROI Measurement**: Measure return on investment for integration usage
- **Predictive Analytics**: Forecast integration needs based on usage patterns

## üîß Configuration & Customization

### Service Configuration:
- **Custom Endpoints**: Configure custom API endpoints and webhooks
- **Environment Variables**: Manage environment-specific configuration
- **Webhook Filters**: Configure which events trigger notifications
- **Rate Limiting**: Set custom rate limits for API usage

### Advanced Settings:
- **Custom Integrations**: Build and integrate custom services
- **API Versioning**: Manage different versions of integrated APIs
- **Fallback Mechanisms**: Configure backup services for high availability
- **Load Balancing**: Distribute load across multiple service instances

## üöÄ Scaling & Enterprise

### Enterprise Features:
- **Organization Management**: Manage integrations across multiple teams
- **Advanced Permissions**: Granular access control for enterprise environments
- **Audit Compliance**: Enterprise-grade audit logging and reporting
- **Custom SLAs**: Service level agreements for integration uptime

### Scalability Solutions:
- **Auto-Scaling**: Automatic scaling based on usage and demand
- **Multi-Region Deployment**: Global deployment for reduced latency
- **Load Balancing**: Intelligent traffic distribution across services
- **Caching Layers**: Multi-layer caching for improved performance

## üìö Integration Resources

### Documentation:
- **Integration Guides**: Step-by-step guides for each service integration
- **API Reference**: Comprehensive API documentation for all integrations
- **Troubleshooting**: Common issues and their solutions
- **Best Practices**: Industry-standard integration patterns and practices

### Support:
- **Community Forums**: Community-driven support and knowledge sharing
- **Professional Services**: Enterprise support and custom integration services
- **Training Resources**: Tutorials and training materials for integration management
- **Certification**: Integration specialist certification programs

sections.title: PiPilot SWE Agent
sections.overview: The PiPilot SWE Agent (Software Engineering Agent) is an autonomous GitHub App that revolutionizes collaborative development by handling complex code tasks through natural language conversations directly on GitHub.
sections.content:
# PiPilot SWE Agent

The **PiPilot SWE Agent** is a cutting-edge autonomous software engineering assistant that integrates seamlessly with GitHub to enable intelligent, conversational development workflows. Built on the PIXEL FORGE AI technology, the SWE Agent transforms how teams collaborate on code.

## ü§ñ What is the PiPilot SWE Agent?

### Core Purpose:
The PiPilot SWE Agent is a GitHub App that monitors your repositories and responds to mentions in issues and pull requests. Simply mention `@pipilot-swe-agent` followed by your request, and the agent analyzes the context, generates appropriate code solutions, and creates pull requests for your review.

### Key Characteristics:
- **Always Available**: 24/7 monitoring and response to repository activity
- **Context-Aware**: Deep understanding of your codebase and project structure
- **GitHub-Native**: Works directly within GitHub without external tools or dashboards
- **Production-Ready**: Generates code following industry best practices and patterns
- **Learning System**: Improves through feedback on accepted and rejected PRs

## üöÄ How It Works

### The Three-Step Workflow:

#### 1. **Install the App**
First, install the PiPilot SWE Agent GitHub App from the marketplace:
- Navigate to your repository settings ‚Üí Installed GitHub Apps
- Search for "PiPilot SWE Agent" in the GitHub Marketplace
- Click "Install" and grant the necessary permissions
- The agent now has access to analyze and modify your repository

#### 2. **Create an Issue or Comment**
Create a GitHub issue or add a comment to an existing issue/PR with:
- The mention: `@pipilot-swe-agent`
- Your request/task in natural language
- Any additional context or requirements

**Example:**
```
@pipilot-swe-agent Create a user authentication API with login, signup, 
and password reset endpoints. Use bcrypt for password hashing and JWT 
for session management.
```

#### 3. **Review & Merge**
The agent:
- Analyzes your repository structure and codebase
- Generates a complete, tested implementation
- Creates a pull request with the proposed changes
- You review, test, and merge when satisfied
- The agent learns from your feedback for future improvements

## ‚ú® Key Features

### üìù Intelligent Code Generation

**Contextual Understanding:**
- Analyzes your entire codebase to understand patterns and conventions
- Detects your technology stack and frameworks
- Follows your existing code style and architecture
- Respects .gitignore and project configuration files

**Advanced Capabilities:**
- Full-stack feature implementation (backend + frontend + database)
- API endpoint generation with proper validation and error handling
- Database schema design and migrations
- Component creation with TypeScript support
- Testing code (unit, integration, end-to-end)

### üîç Code Analysis

**Deep Repository Understanding:**
- Reads and analyzes project files to understand structure
- Identifies dependencies and their versions
- Recognizes existing utilities, components, and helpers
- Detects configuration patterns and environment setup

**Smart Recommendations:**
- Suggests optimal locations for new code
- Identifies opportunities for code reuse
- Proposes refactoring improvements
- Highlights potential conflicts or duplications

### üå≥ Project Structure Awareness

**Automatic Detection:**
- Recognizes Next.js, React, Express, FastAPI, and other frameworks
- Understands monorepo structures and workspaces
- Identifies directory conventions (src/, app/, etc.)
- Detects TypeScript, JavaScript, Python, and other languages

**Intelligent Integration:**
- Places files in appropriate directories
- Uses correct import paths and module resolution
- Follows framework-specific conventions
- Maintains consistent project organization

### üîÑ Pull Request Generation

**Comprehensive PRs:**
- Clear, descriptive PR titles and descriptions
- Detailed change summaries with sections for:
  - **What Changed**: Summary of modifications
  - **Why It Changed**: Rationale and context
  - **How to Test**: Instructions for verification
  - **Related Issues**: Links to GitHub issues

**Change Tracking:**
- Lists all modified files with brief descriptions
- Highlights new dependencies or breaking changes
- Notes configuration changes or setup requirements
- Provides migration guidance if applicable

### üß™ Testing & Validation

**Automatic Test Generation:**
- Creates unit tests for new functions and components
- Generates integration tests for API endpoints
- Produces e2e tests for complete workflows
- Includes fixtures and mock data

**Quality Assurance:**
- Validates syntax and type correctness
- Checks for common security vulnerabilities
- Verifies code follows linting standards
- Tests database migrations and schema changes

## üí° Use Cases

### 1. **Feature Development**
Request complex features with natural language:
```
@pipilot-swe-agent Add a real-time notification system that:
- Sends notifications to users when they receive messages
- Supports email and in-app notifications
- Includes notification preferences in user settings
- Uses WebSockets for real-time updates
```

### 2. **Bug Fixes**
Describe bugs and let the agent generate fixes:
```
@pipilot-swe-agent Fix the authentication issue where sessions expire 
after 1 hour instead of the configured 24 hours. Check the JWT token 
expiration logic in the auth middleware.
```

### 3. **Code Refactoring**
Request architectural improvements:
```
@pipilot-swe-agent Refactor the user service to use dependency injection 
pattern and extract database queries into a separate repository layer.
```

### 4. **API Development**
Generate complete REST or GraphQL APIs:
```
@pipilot-swe-agent Create a complete REST API for product management 
including CRUD operations, filtering, pagination, and proper error handling.
```

### 5. **Database Migrations**
Design and implement database changes:
```
@pipilot-swe-agent Add a new "notifications" table with fields for:
- user_id (foreign key)
- type (enum: message, alert, update)
- content (text)
- read (boolean)
- created_at (timestamp)

Include indexes on frequently queried fields.
```

### 6. **Documentation Generation**
Generate comprehensive API documentation:
```
@pipilot-swe-agent Generate OpenAPI/Swagger documentation for all 
API endpoints. Include request/response examples and error codes.
```

## üîê Security & Permissions

### Required Permissions

The SWE Agent requires the following GitHub App permissions:

**Repository Permissions:**
- `contents: write` - Read and write repository files and commits
- `pull_requests: write` - Create and manage pull requests
- `issues: write` - Read and respond to issues and comments
- `statuses: write` - Set commit statuses for CI/CD integration

**User Permissions:**
- `user:email` - Access user email for authentication

### Security Practices

**Safe by Design:**
- Never directly commits to main/master branch
- Always creates feature branches for proposed changes
- Requires manual review and merge of all PRs
- All sensitive data is encrypted and stored securely
- OAuth 2.0 compliance for all authentication

**Audit & Transparency:**
- Every change is tracked and auditable
- Clear commit messages showing agent-generated changes
- PR descriptions document all modifications
- Activity logs available in your dashboard

## üéØ Best Practices

### Writing Effective Requests

**Be Specific:**
- Include exact requirements and constraints
- Mention any frameworks or libraries to use
- Specify data models and relationships
- Include performance or scalability requirements

**Provide Context:**
- Link related issues or discussions
- Share relevant code snippets
- Mention existing patterns to follow
- Note any integration requirements

**Example of Good Request:**
```
@pipilot-swe-agent Create a user profile page that:
- Displays user information (name, email, avatar)
- Allows editing profile details with form validation
- Shows user's recent activity (last 10 posts)
- Has a "Change Password" section
- Uses the existing UserService for API calls
- Follows the dashboard layout components

Use TypeScript, Tailwind CSS for styling, and React hooks.
Store avatar images in Supabase Storage.
```

### Review Process

**Before Merging:**
1. **Review Code**: Check logic, style, and security
2. **Run Tests**: Execute all test suites locally
3. **Check Performance**: Monitor build size and runtime performance
4. **Test Functionality**: Manually verify the feature works as intended
5. **Review Dependencies**: Check for unnecessary or vulnerable packages

**Provide Feedback:**
- Comment on specific changes if modifications are needed
- Mention the agent again with additional requirements
- Ask for refactoring or improvements
- The agent uses this feedback to improve future PRs

## üìä Dashboard Features

### Repository Overview
- Connected installations count
- Task usage statistics (tasks used this month)
- Days until usage reset
- Recent activity timeline

### Connected Installations
- View all GitHub App installations for your account
- Manage permissions per installation
- Monitor installation status and health

### Usage Tracking
- Tasks completed this month
- Remaining tasks in current billing period
- Usage history and trends
- Cost breakdown and billing information

### Settings & Management
- Account settings and profile configuration
- API key management for integrations
- Notification preferences
- Security and privacy settings

## üîß Configuration

### Repository Settings

**GitHub App Permissions:**
- Configure access levels per repository
- Choose repositories for the agent to monitor
- Enable/disable agent for specific teams

**Custom Rules:**
- Set naming conventions for branches and PRs
- Define code style preferences
- Specify required reviewers or approval rules
- Configure protected branch requirements

### Integration Settings

**CI/CD Integration:**
- Connect with GitHub Actions
- Configure automated testing and deployment
- Set up status checks and required reviews

**External Services:**
- Integrate with project management tools
- Connect to deployment platforms
- Link with monitoring and logging services

## üìà Analytics & Insights

### Development Metrics
- Number of PRs created by the agent
- Acceptance rate (merged vs. closed)
- Code review feedback patterns
- Common improvement areas

### Quality Metrics
- Test coverage of generated code
- Build failure rates
- Security vulnerability detection
- Performance impact of changes

## üÜò Troubleshooting

### Common Issues

**Issue: Agent not responding to mentions**
- Verify the GitHub App is installed on the repository
- Check that the app has the required permissions
- Ensure repository is not private and inaccessible
- Confirm proper mention format: `@pipilot-swe-agent`

**Issue: Generated code doesn't match requirements**
- Provide more specific and detailed requirements
- Share relevant code snippets and examples
- Link to related issues with more context
- Request revisions in the PR comments

**Issue: PR contains merge conflicts**
- The agent will typically resolve common conflicts
- Comment requesting conflict resolution
- Provide manual conflict resolution guidance if needed

## üöÄ Advanced Features

### Batch Processing
- Request multiple related features in a single issue
- Agent prioritizes and sequences implementation
- Coordinated PRs for dependent features

### Learning from Feedback
- Agent improves code style from your corrections
- Adapts to your preferred patterns and conventions
- Learns project-specific requirements over time

### Multi-Repository Support
- Install agent across multiple repositories
- Share learned patterns across projects
- Unified dashboard for all repositories

## üìö Getting Help

### Documentation
- Complete API documentation
- Code examples and recipes
- Troubleshooting guides
- Best practices guide

### Support
- GitHub issues for bug reports and feature requests
- Community discussions and help forums
- Email support for enterprise customers
- Direct chat support for critical issues

## üéì Learning Resources

### Tutorials
- Getting started with PiPilot SWE Agent
- Common use cases and examples
- Advanced features and techniques
- Integration patterns and best practices

### Community
- GitHub discussions for questions and ideas
- Community-shared templates and recipes
- User showcase of amazing projects
- Developer community for sharing and learning
